item.title: Welcome to My Garden
item.description: This is the home page of my digital garden. üå± Still learning Quartz! Please be patient! Act of Faith.

item.title: Act of Faith
item.description: üïØÔ∏èPrayers Act of Faith O my God, I firmly believe all the truths that the Holy Catholic Church believes and teaches; I believe these truths, O Lord, because You, the infallible Truth, have revealed them to her; in this faith I am resolved to live and die.

item.title: Act of Hope
item.description: üïØÔ∏èPrayers Act of Hope O my God, relying on Your promises, I hope that, through the infinite merits of Jesus Christ, You will grant me pardon of my sins, and the graces necessary to serve you in this life and to obtain eternal happiness in the next.

item.title: Act of Love
item.description: üïØÔ∏èPrayers Act of Love O my God, I love You with my whole heart and above all things, because You are infinitely good and perfect; and I love my neighbor as myself for love of You.
